sentences.sContent: So why go to Iraq when you can go to Canada?
sentences.sContent_eng: So why go to Iraq when you can go to Canada?
sentences.sCn: 因此，如果你可以去加拿大的话，为什么要去伊拉克呢？

sentences.sContent: I have a picture of you and I together in Iraq.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have a picture of you and I together in Iraq.
sentences.sCn: 我有一张您和我一起在伊拉克的照片。

sentences.sContent: I learned about the present acute situation in Iraq in the newspapers.
sentences.sContent_eng: I learned about the present acute situation in Iraq in the newspapers.
sentences.sCn: 我从报上得知伊拉克目前的严重局势。
